Join the Mayday Collective!

Are you a freelancer with talents in digital marketing, web development, PR, photography, copywriting or social media? Or do you want to quit your day job and take your talents on the road, working where and when you like? Mayday Collective is building a talent pool of creative and focussed people who want to bring their specialist skills to projects. If you're motivated and enjoy the freedom of freelance work, get in touch!

Want to join the Collective?
